descriptionHtml:
Mod will add to you \"Mini companion\" 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
It already has Nightingale Bow and Elven Arrows. 

She owns different spells, even can call some creature. 

If you want give she other weapon\'s  install this mod \"NPC Bartering\". 

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6802

Companion will follow, and to fight for you, but to direct orders doesn\'t listen... 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation 

Drop file \"Mini.esp\" in Skyrim\\Data\\... 

Activate in laucher file \"Mini\" 

Come into game, quickly move to other location then you will have it =)

-------------------------------------------------------

Thanks to \"NPC Editor\" and tutorial =)

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4590
author: serfernet2
